author: cnbc.com
title: Cutting Edge Healthcare Acquires Respiratory Therapeutics Group
text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Cutting Edge HC acquired Los Angeles-based Respiratory Therapeutics Group (RTG).
RTG, www.rtghealth.com , a manufacturer of Respiratory Disposable Devices and products, will continue to operate as a wholly owned subsidiary of Cutting Edge.
Meyer Greenbaum, CEO of Cutting Edge HC, commented, “The addition of RTG to the Cutting Edge family gives us a high quality, brand product portfolio to complement some of the exciting and unique technologies that are currently under development in one of our initial groups of chronic condition areas of focus - Respiratory Care. We look forward to working with the very talented team at RTG, to expanding and developing the product line and continue providing critical solutions to our customers.”
“We are tremendously excited to join the rapidly expanding Cutting Edge portfolio of Companies,” said Jacob Shallman, CEO of RTG. “Their extensive industry knowledge and differentiated ESaaS (EcoSystem as a Solution) model for the rapidly evolving healthcare landscape represents a wonderful opportunity for RTG and its’ employees.”
About Cutting Edge HC
Cutting Edge HC is a Los Angeles-based Management Company, with varied holdings in emerging and innovative medical device companies and disruptive service solutions for the Healthcare Industry. For more information on Cutting Edge, go to www.cuttingedgehc.com or email info@cuttingedgehc.com
About Respiratory Therapeutics
RTG is a global manufacturer of Respiratory Devices, with an extensive brand portfolio of respiratory disposable devices, products and service solutions designed by Respiratory Therapists for a diverse range of therapies. RTG Products are distributed in Acute, Sub Acute, Skilled Nursing, Home and Hospice Settings, through our increasing network of distribution partners.
For more information on RTG, go to www.rtghealth.com or email info@rtghealth.com
